title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 4 data points.
Overall Sales in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Max Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 4.29 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 3.84 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in billion U.S. dollars with a total of 4 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2019 to 2016.
